page.title: 12PARKNEUK COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: The Parkneuk Community Centre was opened in 1974 by Councillor T. Ritchie.It consists of a hall,a committee room,a kitchen and toilets.It is used nearly every day of the week.A typical week is probably . Monday: Karate. Tuesday: 1st Tuesday of each month is Womens Rural Institute. Wednesday: Karate,Dunfermline Accordian band,Slimming club. Thursday: Bingo. Friday: Karate,Junior discos,Games nights in winter. Saturday: Monthly dances. Sunday: Morning pigeon club. Throughout the year there are teenage discos,fancy dress parties,Christmas events for Senior Citizens and children,coffee evenings and W.R.I. entertainment.Charges are made for the use of the centre.{
